channel.title: Questons please help >.<
channel.description:
:) I'm new to the site, in fact this is my first post, I just got started doing all this, this weekend, so I guess that makes me a noob. There I said it I'm a noob, now that thats out of the way:
( :cool: I'm useing the source testscape :cool:)
[b]How do you open doors?[/b] :confused: I would rather have the person walk to the door and open it, instead of clicking on the door and it disappears, although I don't even know how to do that so, either would help.
[b]How do you make monsters move?[/b] :confused: I know how to spawn them and I have their x y range all set...but they don't move, I also have the walk type set to 2 if that helps.
[b]Is it possible to make monsters aggesive?[/b] :confused: None of the previous monsters in this source were, so is it possible? If so then how do you make them aggresive?
(last one) [b]How do you make it possible to go into some of the caves etc like on the volcano on karenjama?[/b] :confused: I have no clue how I would do this...
alright thats it, at least for now...heh ;)
I can't reply right away but I will check this post later so in advance, thank you for any replies. :D

item.title: Questons please help >.<
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

ok second of you could type ::noclip but you could and press f4 when your in if ur using mopar that is way to find out the cords the fastest way if u cant get into a cave and to get doors to open il look for a tut for you and to make a command all you have to do is go to client.java search for “nottedbarrows” if that dont work search for “master”. add this bellow it with your info

if (command.startsWith(“COMMANDNAME”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
addItem(ITEMID,HOWMANY);
addItem(ITEMID,HOWMANY);
addItem(ITEMID,HOWMANY);
addItem(ITEMID,HOWMANY);
}

THE COMMAND NAME WILL BE WHEN U TYPE ::COMMANDNAME

AND THE PLAYERRIGHTS ARE AS FOLLOWS

1- MOD ONLY MODS/ADMINS/OWNERS CAN USE
2 - ADMIN/OWNER ONLY
3 - OWNER ONLY

Read full topic

item.title: Questons please help >.<
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

alright thats great that you can open doors and make monters aggresive but I would like to know HOW, and I want to make doors (other than the ones in varrok)
be able to open.Also how do I get the coordinates of the cave if I can’t get in it, in the first place? In fact how do I even make a :: command?

Read full topic

item.title: Questons please help >.<
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

How do you open doors?
never seen a door shut in varrok but its possible

How do you make monsters move?
go to autospawn beside there discription at the end it wil give a number change that number to 3

Is it possible to make monsters aggesive?
its possible

(last one)
How do you make it possible to go into some of the caves etc like on the volcano on karenjama?
teleport using mage or ::Tele xxxx xxxx

Read full topic

item.title: Questons please help >.<
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

I’m new to the site, in fact this is my first post, I just got started doing all this, this weekend, so I guess that makes me a noob. There I said it I’m a noob, now that thats out of the way:

( I’m useing the source testscape )

How do you open doors?
I would rather have the person walk to the door and open it, instead of clicking on the door and it disappears, although I don’t even know how to do that so, either would help.

How do you make monsters move?
I know how to spawn them and I have their x y range all set…but they don’t move, I also have the walk type set to 2 if that helps.

Is it possible to make monsters aggesive?
None of the previous monsters in this source were, so is it possible? If so then how do you make them aggresive?

(last one)
How do you make it possible to go into some of the caves etc like on the volcano on karenjama?
I have no clue how I would do this…

alright thats it, at least for now…heh

I can’t reply right away but I will check this post later so in advance, thank you for any replies.
